EmailTemplate.name: Introducing MBO Partners (1369750593.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing MBO Partners (1369750593.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE HI Elisa, Please see email below as a suggested draft if your firm signs the contract and TDA. This email explains our function and invoicing role. Dear Client, Thank you for the opportunity to provide support on the XXXX effort. At this point in the process I would like to introduce you to Sara Conde, who is my contact at MBO Partners, Inc. MBO’s service is designed for independent consultants and small businesses <http://www.mbopartners.com/#howwehelp> who choose to plug into the MBO Services Cloud and make it easier for them to work with their clients. They take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so I can stay focused on delivering services. They have also put together a short one <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> page collateral that explains how they work and the markets they serve. <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf>As a function of this service, MBO Partners will be invoicing and accepting payments on my behalf. The following links and attachments above provide their W-9, certificate of insurance, payment information etc. <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Wire_and_Payment_Information.pdf>If you have any questions about MBO Partners you can reach out to Sara Conde (copied above) at 703-793-6028 or via email at Sconde@mboparterners.com . Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Wire_and_Payment_Information.pdf> <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com>Best, <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com>Your name <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com> <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com>___________________________________ <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com>SARA CONDE <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com>Consultant Services Advisor <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com>MBO Partners <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com> <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com>t: 703.793.6028 <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com>f: 703.793.6068 <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:Sconde@mboparterners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> <http://www.mbopartners.com/>We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. <http://www.mbopartners.com/> <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde>Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com>
